alert.note: Alert for Monterey (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 10 at 9:00AM PST until further notice by NWS Monterey
info.description: .Between two and four additional inches of rainfall is expected today. This will likely lead to additional rises and flooding on the Big Sur River. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of central California, including the following county, Monterey. This includes the Big Sur River. * WHEN...Until 300 PM PST Friday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of the Big Sur River and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 856 AM PST, Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly on the Big Sur River. Between 3 and 5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 2 to 4 inches are possible in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Big Sur Village and Andrew Molera State Park. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
